summary: LobbyPage appears refactored to rely on the canonical useGetChatrooms (['chatrooms']) query and performs search/category filtering in-memory with debounced search, while preserving the recovery/loading gate via useForceFreshChatroomsOnActorReady (isRecovering). Diff is truncated, so some acceptance criteria (e.g., empty-state UI behavior) cannot be fully verified from provided evidence.
